title: Morgellons Disease: Microscopic Robots in Your Body? - (Bonus from Bizarre Times)
description:
Some say every human on the planet has already been infected with Morgellons. My special guest tonight is Dr. Christopher Macklin who sits down with me to discuss what he says is the true nature of it and where it really came from. His book is called History Truth & Healing. Do your own research and make up your OWN mind

Want more paranormal episodes? Follow our new podcast 'Paranormal Fears' on any podcast app or Apple Podcasts.

Enjoy the AD-FREE versions of our latest episodes and our archives right now from anywhere in the world.
